Case# PersonNameComponentsFormatter.Style.default

iOS 9.0+iPadOS 9.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.11+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
case `default`
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter/style-swift.enum/default#Discussion)

The form with minimally necessary features for differentiation in a casual setting. See “[Default](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter#Default)” for details about its specific behavior. Equivalent to [`PersonNameComponentsFormatter.Style.medium`](/documentation/foundation/personnamecomponentsformatter/style-swift.enum/medium).
